events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position on time and included all the required documents.
Application was reviewed and classified under the engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and developer.
The recruitment team assigned John Doe as the recruiter responsible for managing this candidate’s interview process.
Initial phone screening was conducted to assess the candidate’s basic technical skills and motivation for the engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the position and availability for the technical interview.
A technical interview was arranged for the candidate with the engineering team, scheduled for 2024-05-05 at 10:00 AM.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
The HR interview was scheduled to further evaluate the candidate’s cultural fit and discuss compensation expectations.
HR interview was completed, and the candidate appeared well-aligned with company values and organizational culture.
An official job offer was sent to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and other employment terms.
The candidate responded with positive feedback, expressing excitement about the offer and interest in joining the team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer, confirming the start date and completing the acceptance process.
The onboarding process began with an introduction to company systems, team members, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process was officially closed, marking the successful integration of the candidate into the engineering team.
